mapper.select: select r.race_No, r.race_Date, (select h.horse_name from horse h where r.FIRST_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "first_Horse_Name", (select h.horse_name from horse h where r.SECOND_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "second_Horse_Name", (select h.horse_name from horse h where r.THIRD_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "third_Horse_Name", (select h.horse_name from horse h where r.FOURTH_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "fourth_Horse_Name", (select h.horse_name from horse h where r.FIFTH_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "fifth_Horse_Name", r.first_Horse, r.second_Horse, r.third_Horse, r.fourth_Horse, r.fifth_Horse, (select h.speed from horse h where r.FIRST_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "first_Horse_Speed", (select h.speed from horse h where r.second_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "second_Horse_Speed", (select h.speed from horse h where r.third_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "third_Horse_Speed", (select h.speed from horse h where r.fourth_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "fourth_Horse_Speed", (select h.speed from horse h where r.FIFTH_HORSE = h.horse_no) as "fifth_Horse_Speed", decode((select h.total_games from horse h where r.FIRST_HORSE = h.horse_no), 0,0,((select h.win_count from horse h where r.FIRST_HORSE = h.horse_no)/(select h.total_games from horse h where r.FIRST_HORSE = h.horse_no)))*100 as "first_Horse_WinRate", decode( (select h.total_games from horse h where r.second_HORSE = h.horse_no),0,0,((select h.win_count from horse h where r.second_HORSE = h.horse_no) / (select h.total_games from horse h where r.second_HORSE = h.horse_no))) *100 as "second_Horse_WinRate", decode((select h.total_games from horse h where r.third_HORSE = h.horse_no),0,0,((select h.win_count from horse h where r.third_HORSE = h.horse_no)/(select h.total_games from horse h where r.third_HORSE = h.horse_no))) *100 as "third_Horse_WinRate", decode( (select h.total_games from horse h where r.fourth_HORSE = h.horse_no), 0,0,((select h.win_count from horse h where r.fourth_HORSE = h.horse_no)/(select h.total_games from horse h where r.fourth_HORSE = h.horse_no))) * 100 as "fourth_Horse_WinRate", decode((select h.total_games from horse h where r.FIFTH_HORSE = h.horse_no),0,0,((select h.win_count from horse h where r.FIFTH_HORSE = h.horse_no)/(select h.total_games from horse h where r.FIFTH_HORSE = h.horse_no))) *100 as "fifth_Horse_WinRate" from race r where r.race_no = #{race_No}
